statements: DELETE FROM notifications WHERE product_name = 'Example Product';
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE stock_level < notification_threshold;
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Example Product';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = (SELECT product_id FROM products WHERE product_name = 'Example Product');
DELETE FROM stock_changes WHERE product_id = 1 AND new_stock_level <= 0
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE id = 100 AND product_id = 3
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 100 AND stock_level < 10;
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE notification_id IN (SELECT notification_id FROM notifications WHERE notification_text LIKE '%urgent%');
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 1 AND stock_level < 10;
DELETE FROM low_stock_alerts WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
